column4: Does anyone know if you can play WoW with Wine WITHOUT Installing it? But instead playing it off a hard drive that it is already pre installed into ?
Damn  I was hoping there was away around it
:), I had a windows WoW installation and when I booted to ubuntu, I just launched the exe file from the install directory and it worked. I have Wine 1.1.40 and Ubuntu 64bit 9.04
what do you mean by the red text?
